main event: A civilian reported observing an unidentified aerial object in Leominster, Massachusetts on October 21, 1960.
interesting points: The object was observed for 3 minutes and followed a straight course., The object's characteristics resembled those typically described as a UFO., The report indicated a red color associated with the object, which was difficult to explain., A military aircraft reportedly sighted a similar unidentified object that burst into flames., This event is related to Project Blue Book and was communicated to various military channels.
witness description: Witness's identity is blacked out in the record.
